docs.lead_paragraph: ALL out of breath, an agitated matron rushed into a book store in a New York railway terminal one morning some years ago. "I want 'Holt on Feeding of Children.'" she said. "I must have it at once."

headline.main: IDEAS FOR CHILDREN'S FOOD; Child Health Week Brings Up the Question of Their Preferences in Relation to the Problem of a Diet Worked Out by Scientists

docs.abstract: Study of preferences of child's food in relation to diet stressed in feature article; illus
docs.snippet: ALL out of breath, an agitated matron rushed into a book store in a New York railway terminal one morning some years ago. "I want 'Holt on Feeding of Children.'" she said. "I must have it at once."

docs.lead_paragraph: A recommendation that the relief budget for May provide for 1,000 additional investigators was made yesterday in a letter to the Board of Estimate by Oswald W. Knauth, executive director of the Emergency Relief Bureau.

headline.main: KNAUTH ASKS FUNDS TO ENLARGE STAFF; Wants 1,000 More Investigators to Weed Out Persons Who Do Not Belong on Relief.

docs.snippet: A recommendation that the relief budget for May provide for 1,000 additional investigators was made yesterday in a letter to the Board of Estimate by Oswald W. Knauth, executive director of the Emergency Relief Bureau.
